hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Qutaibah] telah menceritakan kepada kami [Isma'il bin Ja'far] dari [Humaid] dari [Anas radliallahu 'anhu] berkata, 'Abdurrahman bin 'Auf datang menemui kami lalu Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam mempersaudarakan dia dengan Sa'ad bin Ar-Rabi

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {وَالَّذِينَ عَاقَدَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ فَآتُوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ}
chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah jala jalaaluhu:"... To those also with whom you have made a pledge, give them their due portion by Wasiya..."
